pkmkdoc.description: Parallax Propeller Simple Integrated Development Environment SimpleIDE.

locale.resource:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1138\cocoasubrtf320 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 \ The SimpleIDE installer will add these to your computer:\ \ 1. SimpleIDE application\ 2. Compiler, license info, and tools in /opt/parallax\ 3. Workspace copy in /opt/parallax/Workspace\ \ On first run of the SimpleIDE application, it will copy\ /opt/parallax/Workspace to Documents/SimpleIDE.\ \ The Documents/SimpleIDE folder contains Educational\ libraries, examples, and some demo programs.}
